main event: A series of UFO sightings were reported in April 1966 across locations, including Cleveland and Washington D.C.
interesting points: Witnesses described various lights and shapes in the sky, some reporting rapid acceleration and unusual maneuvers., The sightings included observations of red, green, and white lights that changed in visibility., One witness experienced radio malfunctioning while near a bridge after observing the object., Objects were reported flying at high altitudes and quickly changing direction and speed., The sightings elicited excitement and concern among the witnesses, indicating they believed these were not ordinary aircraft.
sighted object: A bright light/objects in the sky, described as having various colored lights, possibly oval-shaped with a bluish-white glow.
location: Cleveland, Ohio, USA; Washington D.C., USA; Salem, Massachusetts, USA
witness description: Citizens and military personnel (e.g., Lt., SFC US ARMY RET) reported their observations.
